title: Missing unlocked skin
body:
I unlocked Warring Kingdoms Tryndamere long ago from a hextech chest, at that moment I didn't have Tryndamere so i bought him with my ip and then went to the collection to unlock the skin as a permanent.
I went into queue to play as Tryndamere{{champion:23}}  with the new skin (or was) and it didn't show up on my skin selection screen.

I am sure that I unlocked it and not disenchant to essence so please let me know if there is some way you can fix this.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

If you [shoot us a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll be able to look at your account history and see what happened here. :)
Could you check my account please my Rengar skin is not in my inventory anymore.

> [{quoted}](name=Geeovas,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=z8Ed2mdg,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-02-16T03:12:05.712+0000)
>
> Could you check my account please my Rengar skin is not in my inventory anymore.

Hi! You'd need to submit a ticket (you can use the link provided above). I unfortunately don't have access to player accounts and can't take a look myself.
